cleaned_text: [r/awakened](/r/awakened/) Awakening is the realization that far more can be found in direct experience than any concept, belief system, or narrative. The process of awakening is an ever-unfolding one, a deepening of that which is beyond all words and thoughts. We are in service of discovering that for ourselves. I ask because I've used cannabis lsd and shrooms mainly in microdoses. I see all drugs as teachers they are energies that teach but can also be very healing and are now being accepted for treatments of certain conditions. I suffer from chronic pain and am searching for the health if you can heal the mind surely the body will follow. I'm interested to hear from anyone whose used mdma for healing and there experiences
